ComicInfo.Summary: Charles Schulz's gang is back to close out the mini-series with all-new adventures and classic Sunday strips, all under one cover! Snoopy takes center stage, when the super secret origins of the 'Masked Marvel' are revealed! And Charlie Brown can't catch a break as the kite-eating tree returns to exact its vengeance on any and all kites that stray in its path! All that and a special 'Snoopy 1st Appearance' variant cover makes this a must-have issue!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-12 16:36:04. [CVDB332179]
ComicInfo.Writer: Charles M. Schulz, Shane Houghton, Vicki Scott
ComicInfo.Penciller: Matt Whitlock, Paige Braddock, Vicki Scott
ComicInfo.Inker: Matt Whitlock, Paige Braddock, Vicki Scott
ComicInfo.Characters: Charlie Brown, Linus van Pelt, Lucy van Pelt, Snoopy
